metadata.title: CVE-2023-0430 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Certificate OCSP revocation status was not checked when verifying S/Mimesignatures. Mail signed with a revoked certificate would be displayed ashaving a valid signature. Thunderbird versions from 68 to 102.7.0 wereaffected by this bug. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 102.7.1.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
